title: General forum question
content:
Hi.
I've been on Android phones for many years now, and I'm about a week or so in on my very first Pixel (5) device, and I have to say I'm loving it!
I like the fact that we can send feedback in the About phone menu, and I love the online chat that google offer through the Tips+support menu. What a great service this is. Brilliant!
I also like this official google forum to put our questions in, and to look for advice.
However, wouldn't it be more logical to sub divide this forum into device-specific forums, as when I'm looking through here for possible answers they probably wont apply to my specific pixel.

Just a thought.
Keep up the good work. I probably will not sway from Pixels now that I have one! :)
